questionTitle: Where do you ________ going for your holidays this year.
It isn't quite ________ that he will be present at the meeting.
I always ________ to the university by bus because it is much faster.
You are not half ________ you think you are.
I wish I ________ younger.
You ________ a six-month contract when you are offered a permanent position elsewhere. What will you do?
I'll see you in August when I ________ back.
As soon as you ________ that, I'd like you to go to bed .
My husband lived at home before we were married, and so ________.
Let's go out for dinner, ________?
You ________ me, because I didn't say that.
Mother's Day is ________ May.
Could you lend me some money? I'm very ________ of cash at the moment.
Mr and Mrs Hudson are always ________ with each other about money.
I am late because my alarm clock never ________ this morning.
From now on I am not liable ________ my wife's debts.
He ________ the river yesterday.
Finding the money is just one of the problems ________ in buying a house.
I am very ________ your society and should like to have more details.
Nutritionists have found that certain elements long known to be ________ in large quantities are ________ to life in small amounts.
